body.p: The contractual service margin at the transition date equals CU20 and is calculated as follows:

li.p: the contractual service margin measured on initial recognition is CU110, an amount that would have resulted in no income or expenses arising from the fulfilment cash flows that would have been estimated on initial recognition of CU110 (see the table after paragraph IE189); minus
the contractual service margin that would have been recognised in profit or loss before the transition date of CU90, estimated applying paragraph C15.
